other_tests.findings: Small right pleural effusion with associated subsegmental atelectasis, minimal diffuse fatty infiltration of the liver, common bile duct measures 9 mm with a plastic stent in place, moderate stricture of the common hepatic duct, gallbladder half filled with sludge and distended, slight thickening of gallbladder wall, atrophic pancreas, few cortical cysts in kidneys.
